resources.string: The objective is to be the first player to form a line of three consecutive symbols (either in a row, column or diagonal) on a 3x3 board.
One player uses the X symbol. The other player uses the O symbol.

Set up the board The board is a grid of 3 rows and 3 columns (a total of 9 empty squares). Choose who goes first You can decide randomly or just alternate each new game. Alternating turns The first player will place his symbol (X or O) on any empty square on the board. Then, the second player will place his symbol (O or X) on an empty square. Players continue to alternate turns until one of them wins or the game ends in a draw. Winning conditions A player wins if he manages to place three of his symbols in a row, column or diagonal on the board. Drawn game If all the squares on the board are filled and no player has managed to form a line of three consecutive symbols, the game ends in a draw.
